title: My Account was Banned for Trying to Report Racism
body:
These are my chat logs for the game. I reported them both, and then i got hit by a 14 day suspension. Can someone explain? Check my history for the game
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=4523
Game 1
4523: alrighty
4523: so
4523: trollnig duo, flaming hec for being a g o o k even though he got jg
4523: hec was jg, and he wouldnt give it, then started flaming him for being a  g  o o k
4523: please report 
4523: yeah, im not about that racist life
4523: nope
4523: racism amte
4523: keep going budd
4523: new accounts for you guyhs
4523: xD
4523: please report, idgaf if you want to trol, but being racist like tht isnt good enough
4523: gg

replies.body: Ok so there is something missing here, riot wouldn’t ban you for this tbh.
You wouldn't think so, that's why i'm so confused by it
That’s the thing... there is 100% something you not telling us
What possible reason would I have to lie? Riot has the chat logs so me lying wouldn’t work
No I mean lying to the boards here... something is obviously missing no one gonna be gullible enough to think this is the only reason you were banned
he said "g o o k" he got banned. its that simple now.
I say far worse things every game lmao

such as?

it needs to be something on their "no-no" list to get instantly escalated to suspension/ban.

also, you need to actually get reported.

> [{quoted}](name=Lebron Games,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=WUXWz7Y7,comment-id=00010000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2017-12-03T08:01:56.833+0000)
>
> such as?
> 
> it needs to be something on their "no-no" list to get instantly escalated to suspension/ban.
> 
> also, you need to actually get reported.

problem is that once reported, validation of report is outsourced to robots who ignore context. Validation of trolls cant be automated which is why trolls are a much bigger problem atm.

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=WUXWz7Y7,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-02T11:11:35.201+0000)
>
> No I mean lying to the boards here... something is obviously missing no one gonna be gullible enough to think this is the only reason you were banned

Ordinarily I'd agree but the last few months has been horrendous for bans being triggered for minor infractions on previously unblemished accounts. Not saying that this is necessarily the case with 4523, but it is definitely something which is going on generally - NA boards are also full of this sort of query.

similar thing happened to me.

They dont care.
If i could just understand where the ban came from.. was me asking for them to be reported for saying "g o o k" it ?

> [{quoted}](name=4523,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=WUXWz7Y7,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-02T02:01:42.219+0000)
>
> If i could just understand where the ban came from.. was me asking for them to be reported for saying "g o o k" it ?

System triggered for me when I queried whether a person on the other team meant to say g o o k or whether it was a mistype (they said "g o o k work").

Told riot. They agreed that I wasn't using the word to offend. Suspension upheld.

The system is super sensitive these days and player support dont really care about context.
So next time I should tell enemy team to report them for saying a “bad word” seems a bit childish
